channel.title: Block Islands Brands are inspired by the surroundings of RI's ocean jewel.
channel.description: Block Islands Brands are inspired by the surroundings of RI's ocean jewel.

item.title: Block Island Brands' Block Soap
item.description:
Block Island Brands' Block Soap

Block Soap, handcrafted artisan soaps for mind and body. Inspired by the fragrances of Block Island, RI and made is the USA with Olive & Coconut oils and Shea Butter.
